attributes.action: Give a knighthood to Harry Potter actors Daniel Radcliffe, Rupert Grint and Emma Watson
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For the past 8 years, Harry Potter has brought a wonderful world of magic to Britain and the world. The books and the films are brilliant in its form, and is an identity of British culture of the 21st century.

And so, we would like Her Majesty's government to recognise Daniel Radcliffe, Rupert Grint and Emma Watson with an honour for their wonderful portrayals as the progatonists in the Harry Potter films!
